subject: Pedals Plus X
description_text: Hi, I bought the throttle and brake pedals. When I run the manager the pedals are OK and they work, but when I start a game (like rfactor2 or Le Mans Ultimate) the pedals still don't work, the game doesn't see them...how can I fix this?

conversations.body_text: Hi Nicola Santi, Both of these games are supported. Please send me a screenshot of the in-game settings so I can check and better understand the issue.
Solved! I updated the firmware manually and then calibrated the pedals and now they work! Thanks however for the support!
